edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common
Class LSPField

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPObject
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPField
public class LSPField
extends LSPObject

Represents a "field" element as described in the STARTS 1.0 specification. A field simply represents the title of a possible search field, as per the basic1 set of field names. See the FieldNames class for legal field names and types.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new instance, using a code from FieldNames

          Create a field of some other non-basic1 type.

public void toXML(XMLWriter writer)

Description copied from class: LSPObject
Defines how an LSPObject can be represented in XML. The implementor of this method should write all XML to the XMLWriter that has been passed in.
